Narrator is refering to the rule which says that you can't intercept 
weaponfire with other weaponfire. In otherwords, if someone shoots 
at you, you can block the shots with a shield, or you can try to 
dodge. There are some exceptions to this rule, but in general, 
either block with a shield, or dodge. 

Note: A shield could also be a large rock, a tree, etc.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Narrator" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: NO, Hottie, no intercepting shots, it's against the rules. 
READ...
>
